title: Android 10 boot loop happening after having Android 10 for over a month
content:
My Pixel 2 XL (running Android 10) is having the boot loop problem where the G symbol's progress bar loads over and over again. I have been running Android 10 for a while now and have no idea how this happened.

I have Google Authenticator and photos that I need to recover, but I can't get past the boot loader.

Any help? I really don't want to factory reset my phone.
